import React from 'react'; import { useCart } from '../../context/CartContext'; import './ProductDetail.css'; const ProductDetail = ({ product, onClose }) => { const { addToCart } = useCart(); const { name, description, price, image, category, origin, flavorProfile, heatLevel, averageRating } = product; const handleAddToCart = () => { addToCart(product); }; return (
e.stopPropagation()}>

{name}

{description}

Category: {category}
Origin: {origin}
Flavor Profile: {flavorProfile}
Heat Level: {'🌶️'.repeat(heatLevel)}
Rating: {'⭐'.repeat(Math.round(averageRating))} ({averageRating.toFixed(1)})
${price.toFixed(2)}
); }; export default ProductDetail;
